Hello, i wanted to used the NPMPackageValidation as explained in the hapi validation examples. I am wondering, where to find this class or how to include it. I am currently not able to find a reference to this library in the global maven repository.
The validation packages and resources can be included as expected, but the npm is missing.
As it is stated in the javadoc, this is available since Version 5.5.0, but in the maven repository it is 5.4.9 I think this may be the issue. Do you have any hints how to use it right now?
